Text:
I'm in the french alps right now, and it snows @ 1700-1800m every each day due to bad weather condition (the technical term is *springtime*, nevertheless). I hope today's race hasn't been shortened or at least weel re-edited.

Thanks BasilBrush for such a routinely well scheduled adictive medicine you do gracefully pour in the net.

thanks baz...would a few of you please help me seed this soccer game...many many thanks.

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8491134/League_One_PlayOff_Final_-_Brentford_vs_Yeovil_Town_19.05.2013
There's some spectacular scenery in this one. It would look good in HD. The race is almost as scheduled and this time no fog so no problems with TV coverage.
